doc.after: Meanwhile, district councils are chiefly responsible for waste management and construction projects within their respective districts. They each maintain their own budgets, although the metropolitan mayor reserves the right to review district decisions. One-fifth of all district council members, including the district mayors, also represent their districts in the Municipal Council.[134] All members of the district councils and the Municipal Council, including the metropolitan mayor, are elected to five-year terms.[138] Representing the Justice and Development Party, Kadir TopbaÅ has been Mayor of Istanbul since March 2004.[139]
